message:
For those who don't know that #EMACS is the greatest and most extensible piece of software ever written.

Some say:

Linux is the software library that allowa EMACS to talk to the hardware :)
story: Mohamed Samy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Emacs Introduction and Demonstration
caption: youtube.com
description: This presentation was originally given at the Open Source Bridge in Portland, Oregon on 26 June 2014. I re-recorded it at home based on feedback that I had n...

data.message: I hate this editor to the guts
Muhammad Negm then you haven't learnt it  :) the better you become the more you will love it. :)

I spent 1 week and became fluent in vim
spent 1 month in emacs and I wanted to commit suicide :D
anyway I grew up lets give it some time
I never learned VIM, but for some reason when I downloaded I didn't feel that feeling, but when I started playing with EMACS it became a fetish :)

It's all about being productive =D
I think like this :
"
Do I spend alot of time configuring the editor rather than coding ? 
YES
Uninstall the mutafaka
"

Do it for your pinky. Learn Vim now ;)
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Emacs#.22Emacs_pinky.22
Ahmad Fatoum if you're smart enough, just install a mode like "ergoemacs-mode" do it for you inner geek, nothing satisfies the inner Geek as much as EMACS, VIM seems amateurish
Ahmad Fatoum enta 3alatool mo3tared 3ala kol 7agah baqolha ?
leah, dah azon tany comment liya 3la post leek? law 3ayez, momken aba6l a3la2 3l posts bta3tak :)

and nah, I am not smart enough. Instead, I prefer my software to have default settings that are not a health hazard.
I need to say though, fluent in vim in a week sounds like bullshit.
Ahmad Fatoum no please I enjoy your comments :)

Guys, if you really are a Geek, you need to be capable of learning mutiple platforms and architecture and EMACS is a platform and an architecture :) Also, you need to configure and write code and scripts and EMACS is all about that. You need to know shortcuts and be able to learn quickly, EMACS again. Don't fall for being a one trick geek who just makes websites or write databse queries :)
